title: How pandemics end
description: We talk about previous periods in which deadly diseases went global

vocabItems.definition: completely destroy or get rid of something such as a social problem or disease
announce something to be finished before it actually is but when it seems ‘good enough’
happening too soon, before the best time to do it

vocabItems.word: bury your head in the sand
vocabItems.definition: deliberately refuse to accept the truth about something you find unpleasant
the punishment of death for committing a crime, or from a disease which has no cure
